tool_description: Mycelia is a powerful Similarity Search Engine that helps developers quickly build and integrate AI-based recommendations, content search and much more.
name: JQ - Mycelia Production-Ready Similarity Search
title: JQ - Mycelia Production-Ready Similarity Search

api_list.name: get_index_index__db_name__get
api_list.description:
Get index info of a given databse.

Parameters
----------
db_name : str
    Name of the database we want index info from.

mode : Mode, optional
    Response mode of indexes. We have three options:
    - complete: get ALL indexes.
    - summarized: get groups of consecutive indexes.
    - simple: get the number of indexes and their min and max indexes as well.

Returns
-------
List
    Returns a list of integers or strings depending on the mode parameter.

schema.title: Response Get Index Index  Db Name  Get

api_list.name: get_table_fields_table_fields__db_name__get
api_list.description:
Get the column names of a SUPERVISED/UNSUPERVISED database.

Parameters
----------
db_name : str
    Name of database to get the column names from.

Returns
-------
Dict
    Dictionary with the name of columns as keys and an example of their values as... values.
    int -> 0
    float -> 0.01
    string -> "string"

schema.title: Response Get Table Fields Table Fields  Db Name  Get

api_list.name: get_status_status_get
api_list.description:
Get status of API tasks.
So far, provides status of background tasks (202).

Returns
-------
last_status : Dict
    {'Task': 'string',
     'Status': 'string',
     'Description': 'string'}.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jq-mycelia-production-ready-similarity-search.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jq-mycelia-production-ready-similarity-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: check_inserted_data_table_setup_index__db_name__get
api_list.description:
Get the indexes of data inserted with /table/setup/data

Parameters
---------------
db_name : str
    Name of database to check the inserted data.

mode : Mode, optional
    Response mode of indexes. We have three options:
    - complete: get ALL indexes.
    - summarized: get groups of consecutive indexes.
    - simple: get the number of indexes and their min and max indexes as well.

Returns
-------
List
    Returns a list of integers or strings depending on the mode parameter.

schema.title: Response Check Inserted Data Table Setup Index  Db Name  Get

api_list.name: check_valid_name_valid__db_name__get
api_list.description:
Check if a database name is valid.

Returns
-------
response : Whether or not the database name is valid.

api_list.name: get_database_names_names_get
api_list.description:
Get the names of each database in your config file.

Returns
-------
response : List of databases in your config file.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jq-mycelia-production-ready-similarity-search.p.rapidapi.com/names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jq-mycelia-production-ready-similarity-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_database_info_dev_info__db_name__get
api_list.description:
Get a detailed config of a specified database. This is a dev method.

Parameters
----------
db_name : str
    Database name we want the detailed config.

Returns
-------
response : Dict
    Dictionary with the parameters of the specified database.
